Module com.example.demo

Package com.example.demo.screen

package com.example.demo.screen
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.example.demo
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    LevelScreen
    The LevelScreen class is responsible for displaying the current level's background, instructions, and heart displays for players.
    LoseScreen
    The LoseScreen class represents the screen displayed when the player loses the game.
    MainMenuScreen
    The MainMenu class represents the main menu of the game application.
    PauseScreen
    The PauseScreen class represents a UI overlay that appears when the game is paused.
    WinScreen
    The WinScreen class represents the screen displayed when the player wins the game.
